query: Compare three scenarios for Europe: baseline, accelerated_ev, and extended_lifecycles. Generate comparative analysis showing how each scenario affects lead demand from 2025-2035
expected_behavior: Step 1: Runs forecast for Europe baseline scenario
Step 2: Runs forecast for Europe accelerated_ev scenario
Step 3: Runs forecast for Europe extended_lifecycles scenario
Step 4: Uses compare_scenarios.py to generate comparative analysis
Generates comparison report showing differential analysis vs baseline
Report includes absolute differences (kt) and percentage differences for each scenario vs baseline
Shows that accelerated_ev scenario results in lower lead demand (due to more EVs with smaller batteries)
Shows that extended_lifecycles scenario results in lower replacement demand (longer battery life)
Creates comparative visualization plots in output/plots directory
Comparison includes growth rate analysis across scenarios
Output demonstrates understanding that different scenarios have directional impacts (EV adoption reduces demand, extended lifecycles reduce replacement frequency)
Successfully handles multiple CSV inputs from the three forecast runs
